Package org.world.agents.player.melee

Class IdleNode

java.lang.Object
org.world.agents.player.melee.ComboNode
org.world.agents.player.melee.IdleNode
public class IdleNode
extends ComboNode
This class implements an "idle" state in the ComboGraph, i.e. a state which is neither an attack or a dodge move They are used for example while the player is walking/standing around (but do NOT themselves implement such actions), these states leave most of the updates to the player/weapon objects and are more of a placeholder state while the player is not engaged in combat

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • IdleNode

      public IdleNode​(ComboGraph graph, int weaponAnimation, int playerAnimation, boolean canDodge, boolean canMove, boolean canThrow, int xOffset, int yOffset, int duration, int comboWindow, java.lang.String finishSoundPath, java.lang.String startSoundPath)
      Creates a new combo node with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      graph - reference to the ComboGraph object containing then node
      weaponAnimation - index of the weapon animation associated with this node
      playerAnimation - index of the player animation associated with this node
      canDodge - whether the player can dodge at the end fo this state
      canMove - whether the player can move during this state
      canThrow - whether the player can throw an enemy in this state
      xOffset - horizontal offset of the weapon relative to the player
      yOffset - vertical offset of the camera relative to the player
      duration - duration of the state
      comboWindow - time at the end of the state during which input is polled for deciding the next state
      finishSoundPath - string containing the path to the sound file, can be null
      startSoundPath - string containing the path to the sound file, can be null
